name: .DAP File Extension
summary: Learn about .DAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DAP file is a webpage that is connected to an Access database. It can be used to distribute reports via the web or e-mail. DAP files may serve as data entry forms or generate interactive reports.

content: You can build data access pages from scratch within Microsoft Access or create them from other files, such as dBASE files, Paradox tables, spreadsheets, and text files.
NOTE: Microsoft Access 2007 and later versions do not support DAP files.

instructions: You can open and edit a DAP file in pre-2007 versions of Microsoft Access (Windows). You can view the webpage a DAP file describes by opening the file in Internet Explorer (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
